articles.author: Juli Clover
articles.title: Apple Plans to Let Public Beta Testers Download HomePod Software for the First Time
articles.description: While Apple makes iOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS betas available to its public beta testing group, the HomePod software updates that are beta tested are limited to a select group of invite-only testers. That's set to change with the latest round of betas, as A…

articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: iOS 16 Adds Support for Nintendo Switch's Joy-Cons and Pro Controller
articles.description:
While not advertised on Apple's website, it has been discovered that iOS 16 adds support for the Nintendo Switch's Joy-Cons and Pro Controller. The feature was highlighted on Twitter by Riley Testut, the developer behind iOS video game emulator Delta.
